description: This file defines a Redis class that extends DockerApp and DbApp, configuring Redis container parameters, connection methods, and related properties for use within a larger infrastructure project.

classes.name: Redis
classes.description: A class representing a Redis container configuration, extending DockerApp and DbApp, with methods to generate connection strings and manage Redis-specific settings.

methods.name: get_db_password
methods.description: Returns the Redis password, either from an existing attribute or by retrieving it from a secrets file.

methods.name: get_db_database
methods.description: Returns the Redis schema/database name, either from an attribute or secrets file.

methods.name: get_db_host
methods.description: Returns the container name for Redis host.

methods.name: get_db_connection
methods.description: Constructs and returns the Redis connection URL using current configuration.

methods.name: get_db_connection_local
methods.description: Constructs and returns the local Redis connection URL, using local host and port.
